Stuff and Blabla

18. September 2022 15 Comments on
This #Minecraft cake certainly ain’t no lie. *Brps.

18. September 2022 14 Comments on
Wife built a Creeper pinata for a #Minecraft birthday party for the little one ⛏️ (And a Creeper cake 🎂)

16. September 2022 4 Comments on
Slippers with binary print, space invaders and tech/gamer terms? Yes please 🤓

11. September 2022 9 Comments on
Prepping the winter office. This time in another room, that is not prepared for tech yet, so I have to install a bunch of cables first.

8. September 2022 5 Comments on
Another flawless #Fedora upgrade today. Laptop from my mother in law was still on Fedora 33 and the upgrade moved it straight to Fedora 35. Even the Nvidia driver just works. Boooring 🤪

Battlestar Galactica Deadlock

7. September 2022 11 Comments on Battlestar Galactica Deadlock
Playing #BSG Deadlock on Linux PC. Got it dead cheap on GOG during a sale and had no idea if it would work with Wine. Works like a charm and I really enjoy this so far – back in one of my favourite verses out there.

5. September 2022 1 Comment on
And I’ll keep doing it – out of spite: https://beko.famkos.net/2020/02/02/reclaim-your-mailbox/ Alas that’s my personal stuff. I understand your move for business mails. Anyway, where I come from I can always use FAX and that will never die 🤪

31. August 2022 6 Comments on
Looks like #Owncast added #IndieAuth support: https://videos.owncast.online/v/8SRM75skkGRxUCcSLLNWha – I did not see that coming but here is the PR (with the usual suspects 😅) https://github.com/owncast/owncast/pull/1811 – awesome! There is also a call for collab.

29. August 2022 No Comments on

28. August 2022 2 Comments on
It’s legitimate salvage now. A button box waiting to be refurbished for PC gaming.

name: Beko Pharm
note: I dabble in programming, administration, linux, gaming, historical european martial arts, reenactment, live action role play, e-mobility, carhacking, simpits and… parenting?

https://lostinawesome.wordpress.com/.title: If you cut into the present the future leaks out
